name: stake.dnp.dappnode.eth
description: The xDai chain is a stable payments EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) blockchain designed for fast and inexpensive transactions. The chain uses a unique dual-token model; xDai is a stable token used for transactions, payments, and fees, and STAKE is a governance token used to support the underlying POSDAO Proof-of-Stake consensus.
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)
